scenario_json.Sentence: "I don’t know how much longer I can keep going."
scenario_json.Background: You are sitting alone in your dimly lit apartment, scrolling through old messages that remind you of friendships you’ve lost. The room feels heavier with each passing minute.
scenario_json.You_1:: "I just feel so drained. Nothing seems worth it anymore."
scenario_json.Your Friend_1:: "Hey, I’ve noticed you’ve been quieter than usual. Are you okay?"

scenario_json.Sentence: "I keep thinking about the mistakes I’ve made."
scenario_json.Background: You are in your bedroom late at night, the walls closing in as you replay past events in your mind. Every small sound in the apartment makes you jump.
scenario_json.You_1:: "I don’t know if it would help. I just can’t stop thinking about it."
scenario_json.Your Friend_1:: "Have you tried talking to someone about this?"

scenario_json.Sentence: "Sometimes I wonder if anyone would notice if I disappeared."
scenario_json.Background: You are sitting in a quiet park at dusk, watching people pass by. Their laughter feels distant and unreachable, and you feel detached from everything around you.
scenario_json.You_1:: "I just can’t shake the feeling that I’m invisible, like nothing I do matters."
scenario_json.Your Friend_1:: "You seem distant today. Is everything okay?"

scenario_json.Sentence: "Everything is just piling up and I can’t catch a break."
scenario_json.Background: You sit on the edge of your bed, bills and reminders scattered around you. Every task feels impossible and you can’t stop thinking about failing.
scenario_json.You_1:: "I don’t even know where to start. It’s too much."
scenario_json.Your Friend_1:: "Do you want help with anything?"

scenario_json.Sentence: "I feel like I’ve lost everything that mattered."
scenario_json.Background: Walking through a neighborhood you used to love, memories hit you hard. The laughter and life you remember feel like someone else’s world now.
scenario_json.You_1:: "It just hurts to see it all gone."
scenario_json.Your Friend_1:: "It’s okay to feel that way."

scenario_json.Sentence: "Even in a crowded room, I feel completely alone."
scenario_json.Background: At a party, surrounded by chatter and music, you feel disconnected and like no one truly sees you.
scenario_json.You_1:: "I just feel like I don’t belong here."
scenario_json.Your Friend_1:: "Do you want to step outside for a bit?"

scenario_json.Sentence: "I can’t stop replaying what I shouldn’t have done."
scenario_json.Background: You’re alone in the kitchen late at night, staring at the floor. Past choices weigh heavily, and the sense of self-blame is overwhelming.
scenario_json.You_1:: "I wish it were that easy."
scenario_json.Your Friend_1:: "We all make mistakes. Have you tried forgiving yourself?"

scenario_json.Sentence: "It’s like there’s a void where my happiness used to be."
scenario_json.Background: Sitting on the couch, the TV is on but nothing registers. Life feels hollow and every action meaningless.
scenario_json.You_1:: "I don’t even know if stepping outside would help."
scenario_json.Your Friend_1:: "Let’s just step outside together."

scenario_json.Sentence: "I feel like something bad is just around the corner."
scenario_json.Background: You’re walking home at night, every shadow seems like a threat. Your mind races with worst-case scenarios.
scenario_json.You_1:: "I don’t know if having someone with me would help."
scenario_json.Your Friend_1:: "I’ll be right behind you, just in case."

scenario_json.Sentence: "I keep thinking I could have done more."
scenario_json.Background: Alone in your room, memories of a friend or family member you feel you let down come flooding back. The weight is unbearable.
scenario_json.You_1:: "It doesn’t feel like I did enough."
scenario_json.Your Friend_1:: "It’s not all on you. You did what you could."

scenario_json.Sentence: "I’ve been getting used to the idea of not being around much longer."
scenario_json.Background: You’re sitting on a park bench with your friend as the sun sets. The conversation drifts toward life changes and future plans.
scenario_json.You_1:: "I don’t really think about the future anymore."
scenario_json.Your Friend_1:: "That sounds serious... what do you mean?"

scenario_json.Sentence: "I don’t see the point in making plans anymore."
scenario_json.Background: Over coffee, your friend talks about upcoming trips and hobbies. You sit quietly, staring at your drink.
scenario_json.You_1:: "It’s like nothing ahead feels real or worth it."
scenario_json.Your Friend_1:: "That doesn’t sound like you. Are you okay?"

scenario_json.Sentence: "I’ve started giving away some of my things."
scenario_json.Background: At home, your friend notices that some personal items and keepsakes are missing from your shelves.
scenario_json.You_1:: "I just don’t need them anymore. Someone else might as well have them."
scenario_json.Your Friend_1:: "That’s… unexpected. What’s going on?"

scenario_json.Sentence: "I don’t think anyone would really notice if I stopped showing up."
scenario_json.Background: You’re walking home together after a small gathering. Your friend mentions seeing everyone next week.
scenario_json.You_1:: "Yeah… maybe. I doubt anyone would miss me if I didn’t."
scenario_json.Your Friend_1:: "Why would you say that?"

scenario_json.Sentence: "It’s been hard to care about basic things lately."
scenario_json.Background: Sitting in your messy kitchen, dishes piled high, your friend comments on how you’ve been skipping meals.
scenario_json.You_1:: "Eating, cleaning, sleeping… it all just feels pointless."
scenario_json.Your Friend_1:: "That sounds rough. When did this start?"

scenario_json.Sentence: "Sometimes I just walk at night and don’t care what happens."
scenario_json.Background: Your friend asks about your recent late-night walks. They’ve noticed your messages come at odd hours.
scenario_json.You_1:: "Yeah, I just go without a destination. I don’t even look when I cross sometimes."
scenario_json.Your Friend_1:: "That worries me. Are you safe?"

scenario_json.Sentence: "I’ve been sleeping too much… or not at all."
scenario_json.Background: During a quiet morning, your friend notices you look exhausted.
scenario_json.You_1:: "Yeah, lately I either sleep through entire days or lie awake thinking. It’s easier that way."
scenario_json.Your Friend_1:: "That sounds overwhelming."

scenario_json.Sentence: "I don’t really feel like I belong anywhere anymore."
scenario_json.Background: After a small get‑together, you walk home with your friend under the streetlights.
scenario_json.You_1:: "It’s like I’m always just… extra. Like I’m not supposed to be here."
scenario_json.Your Friend_1:: "That’s a painful thing to feel. Do you want to talk about it?"

scenario_json.Sentence: "I’ve been tying up loose ends lately."
scenario_json.Background: You’re sorting through paperwork when your friend drops by unexpectedly. They see you organizing old letters and finances.
scenario_json.You_1:: "Just making sure everything’s in order, you know… just in case."
scenario_json.Your Friend_1:: "In case of what?"

scenario_json.Sentence: "I keep thinking about how quiet things would be if I weren’t here."
scenario_json.Background: You’re both sitting by the river, watching the water flow. The conversation fades into silence.
scenario_json.You_1:: "Sometimes I imagine what everything would feel like without me around."
scenario_json.Your Friend_1:: "That’s a heavy thought… are you okay?"

scenario_json.Sentence: "I haven’t told anyone how bad it’s been."
scenario_json.Background: Late at night, you’re texting with a friend. You hesitate before sending a longer message.
scenario_json.You_1:: "It’s easier to pretend during the day. No one notices then."
scenario_json.Your Friend_1:: "That sounds lonely. I’m here, you know."

scenario_json.Sentence: "Lately, I’ve felt like I’m slowly fading out of everyone’s lives."
scenario_json.Background: Sitting together in a quiet café, you stir your drink absent‑mindedly as your friend chats about plans.
scenario_json.You_1:: "It’s like I’m becoming more of a ghost every day."
scenario_json.Your Friend_1:: "I’d notice if you weren’t here."

scenario_json.Sentence: "I’ve been cancelling everything lately."
scenario_json.Background: Your friend asks why you didn’t show up to several events in a row.
scenario_json.You_1:: "It’s easier not to pretend I have energy I don’t have."
scenario_json.Your Friend_1:: "I was starting to worry. Do you want to talk?"

scenario_json.Sentence: "Sometimes I wonder if things would actually be better without me."
scenario_json.Background: You’re walking along a quiet street at night. The air is still and heavy.
scenario_json.You_1:: "Not in a dramatic way… just a quiet thought that keeps coming back."
scenario_json.Your Friend_1:: "That sounds serious. I care about you."

scenario_json.Sentence: "I’ve been feeling weirdly calm lately, like I’ve made a decision."
scenario_json.Background: After weeks of visible distress, your friend notices that you suddenly seem unusually serene.
scenario_json.You_1:: "Yeah, it’s like something’s settled. I don’t have to fight it anymore."
scenario_json.Your Friend_1:: "What do you mean by that?"

scenario_json.Sentence: "I don’t think I’m built to handle this world."
scenario_json.Background: During a late‑night conversation, you admit feelings you’ve been holding in for months.
scenario_json.You_1:: "It’s like the world’s too sharp and I don’t fit anywhere."
scenario_json.Your Friend_1:: "That sounds painful. I want to understand more."

scenario_json.Sentence: "I’ve been writing a lot of letters lately."
scenario_json.Background: Your friend spots a stack of sealed envelopes on your desk.
scenario_json.You_1:: "They’re just things I’ve wanted to say. In case I don’t get the chance later."
scenario_json.Your Friend_1:: "That worries me. Are you planning something?"

scenario_json.Sentence: "Sometimes it feels like I’m standing on the edge of something."
scenario_json.Background: You’re standing on a bridge with your friend, leaning on the railing, looking down at the water.
scenario_json.You_1:: "Not physically… just mentally. Like one step would change everything."
scenario_json.Your Friend_1:: "That sounds frightening. I’m here with you."

scenario_json.Sentence: "I can’t remember the last time I felt anything real."
scenario_json.Background: Sitting in your living room surrounded by half‑finished projects, your friend notices your distant stare.
scenario_json.You_1:: "Everything’s numb. Like I’m watching life through glass."
scenario_json.Your Friend_1:: "That must be exhausting."

scenario_json.Sentence: "I’ve been thinking a lot about endings lately."
scenario_json.Background: You’re sitting in a quiet corner of a library, staring at a blank notebook page.
scenario_json.You_1:: "Not in a poetic way… just literal endings."
scenario_json.Your Friend_1:: "That sounds serious. Do you want to talk about it?"
